Player History
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 4/3/1985 to a 1-year deal worth $384,000 per year...
Earned first career win on 7/9/1985...
Signed as a free agent by Toronto on 3/3/1986 to a minor league contract.

Won World Series with Toronto in 1987...
Signed as a free agent by New York (M) on 2/8/1988 to a 1-year deal worth $2,500,000 per year...
Injured on 5/31/1988 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...

Signed as a free agent by New York (Y) on 4/3/1990 to a minor league deal...
7/27/1990: Signed a contract extension with New York (Y), $1,570,000 per year, for 2 years.
Injured on 4/18/1992 with a Torn Back Muscle, out for full season...
